backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping app requirements to related source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human-written summaries describing the roles of all frontend files in the screening app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining the app’s theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Indonesian metadata and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the ScreeningFlow.
frontend/src/components/screening/compon: Progress bar showing questionnaire completion using a gradient fill.
frontend/src/components/screening/data/m: Defines the 20 M‑CHAT‑R questions with critical‑item flags.
frontend/src/components/screening/scorin: Implements M‑CHAT‑R scoring to compute low, medium, or high risk levels.
frontend/src/components/screening/Screen: State machine orchestrating hero, input, questionnaire, and results steps with scoring logic.
Layout wrapper providing background gradient and centered max‑width container.
frontend/src/components/screening/sectio: Footer containing About information and FAQ accordion inside styled cards.
Displays the landing hero with title, description, image, and a start button for beginning the screening.
Collects child demographics (age and gender) with validation before starting the screening.
Shows each M-CHAT-R question with answer buttons, progress tracking, and navigation controls.
Presents the final risk result with contextual recommendations and an option to restart the screening.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity auth flow, storing identity, providing login/logout, and exposing login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file since all logic is handled client‑side.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, fonts, and Tailwind CSS variables for the app’s color system and theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider setup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme options (fonts, OKLCH color tokens, radii, shadows, animations), and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state and requirements for a single-page ASD screening tool app, including flow, visual style, assets, and feature list.
